title: Instead of banning males from a paid event, deal with the situation within your company, Riot.

embed.description: But I know most of them won't. That's their choice. My choice? My choice is to reject them from my spaces. They're not welcome here, they're not welcome in gaming anymore. To strive towards justice, we sometimes have to be harsh and exclusionary. And that's okay.

body:
https://twitter.com/danielzklein/status/1035757067389132800

And while you're at it, fire the Riot members that encourage this bullshit behavior.

This type of mindset should not be allowed.
